tool_description: Retrieves current stock levels for specified products across warehouses, providing real-time inventory counts and last updated timestamps.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to check stock levels for

warehouse_ids.description: List of warehouse IDs to filter by, if empty checks all warehouses

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved stock in counts

error_messages: Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs do not exist in the system.
Invalid warehouse ID: One or more warehouse IDs are not recognized.
Product limit exceeded: Maximum 100 products can be checked at once.
Database connection error: Unable to retrieve stock data, try again later.
usage: Provide product_ids array with valid product identifiers. Optionally specify warehouse_ids to limit scope and include_reserved to include reserved inventory. Returns current stock levels with timestamps.
